de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.normalize

Class TokenLevelReplacements

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.normalize.TokenLevelReplacements

  • public class TokenLevelReplacements
extends java.lang.Object
    Some replacements of tokens that make the parser crash, change token indices and contents in all annotations.
    Author:
    kesslewd
